name: Strawberry and Spinach Salad with Honey Balsamic Vinaigrette
author: Shelby Cady
summary: This is a great easy summer salad, with a lot of options as to mixing and matching. Plus the salad looks pretty fancy. You can throw in any summer fruit or berry with this mix, blueberries and raspberries are a good choice, as are blackberries later in the season. The nuts are optional but a pecan or roasted almond adds a little crunch and more protein!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine the spinach, strawberries, Gorgonzola cheese, and pecans in a large bowl
Stir the balsamic vinegar and honey together in a bowl; slowly stream the olive oil into the mixture while whisking continuously
Drizzle the dressing over the salad just before serving
